answers.answer: GREAT JOB ON QUIT SMOKING!!!! I know it was hard. I'm sorry but I say eat eat eat! That's better than smoking. Try to eat small snacks and healthy ones when u can. Go for walks also! Good luck and congrats!

Thank you! I've been trying to get up early enough to exercise before work (having 3 kids already, that's the only time I can exercise!) I live in MN and it's too cold for walking outside but I plan on it once the weather is above, say, 40... :-)

I live in Minnesota too! It's been hard trying to get walks in but when I do all the fresh air makes me feel so good. Congrats on becoming smoke free! Gaining a little weight after quiting is normal, gaining a little weight in the first trimester is normal too. I've gained about 6 pounds so far abound I'm 9w5d. It will all balance out in the 2nd trimester. You are doing great! Keep up the good work!

Congrats on quitting smoking! Like jonesaby2 said. Try eating frequently small healthy snacks. And increase your water intake.Eating is better than smoking but you want to avoid gestational diabetes too. =)
How did you stop? Please give me some advice! I feel sick to my stomach the fact that I'm not able to Stop!

Smoking is bad so congrats on stopping cuz its not easy for sure iv went from 1 pack in 2 days to 1 pack in two weeks..my doctors told me its worse to stop if you crave cuz the Fein is worse then smoking cuz the stress tou put on your baby :-) cutting back is the first step. Its amzing you quit..good job :-) iv found myself very hungry as well from cutting back

I think the only reason I was able to quit is because I caught the stomach virus all my kids had had and EVERYTHING made me sick. I also lost 3 lbs while I had the virus but I've put it (and more) back on...

question: So I've managed to quit smoking and now I'm hungry ALL THE TIME! My stomach is growling at me every other hour and I just can't seem to get enough to eat. Blah... I've gained 4 lbs so far and the Dr advised me to maintain my weight, not gain. Sigh... at least I've quit smoking.
